RT @C_Sommerfeldt The FDA won't immediately lift a ban on blood donations from gay and bisexual men in light of @AOC and @RepMaloney calling for a revision amid the COVID-19 crisis, a spokesman tells me. 

The agency is however "actively considering the situation," he says. https://www.nydailynews.com/coronavirus/ny-coronavirus-aoc-maloney-fda-blood-20200401-guw52wf7ujdszhpdgnzcoxc62e-story.html

States like Massachusetts have opened special enrollment periods for uninsured Americans to sign up for health care. It’s unacceptable that President Trump won’t do this nationally during a pandemic. He needs to stop playing politics & start saving lives. https://www.politico.com/news/2020/03/31/trump-obamacare-coronavirus-157788

If you're able to stay at home right now, one good thing you can accomplish is completing the 2020 Census. It's safe, confidential, and will help represent your community for the next decade.

Remind your family, friends and neighbors to do the same. #CensusDay2020 https://twitter.com/sesamestreet/status/1245350979907788801 QT @sesamestreet Make your family count today on #CensusDay! Learn more about the #2020Census from your favorite furry friends and visit http://www.2020census.gov to fill yours out today. #CountAllKids http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1245350664722616320/img/caypa6vSrLUbCoTm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245350664722616320/vid/480x270/_TwnFzx3ldxRQgcY.mp4?tag=13

.@Uber, @Instacart, @DoorDash, and @Grubhub have a responsibility to protect the health of their workers and the public. They must reclassify their workers as employees, not independent contractors, to ensure they get essential protections and benefits. https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/jge9w8/elizabeth-warren-calls-on-uber-instacart-to-reclassify-workers-as-employees

RT @AdyBarkan Mitch McConnell thinks that @SpeakerPelosi should "stand down" and stop pursuing a fourth relief bill. 

Retweet if you disagree. I know the Speaker is listening. https://twitter.com/costareports/status/1245493307456847875 QT @costareports My interview w/ McConnell...

“She needs to stand down," he says of Speaker's pursuit of a "Phase 4" bill. 

Cold water on infra: "It would take a lot of convincing to convince me."

“Not at all,” he said, when asked if his judicial effort will be paused.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/powerpost/mcconnell-says-pelosi-should-stand-down-on-passing-another-rescue-bill/2020/04/01/a9ac7fbe-737f-11ea-87da-77a8136c1a6d_story.html

This is tragic. A nonviolent drug charge shouldn't become a death sentence. Our prisons are especially vulnerable to #COVID19 spread—we can prevent more deaths by passing my bill that would release certain people from our jails to ensure the safety of all. https://reason.com/2020/03/29/first-known-federal-inmate-dies-of-coronavirus/

The Chinese Communist Party’s decision to suppress information and to punish doctors and reporters from relaying the truth about the #coronavirus has played a critical role in the spread of this virus and has put the lives of millions at risk. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1245358818575495177/img/VNXt00iTmv50sRwd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245358818575495177/vid/480x270/IJLijMcRh3JEONRK.mp4?tag=13

🎵Quarantine and I🎵

These students weren’t going to let the #Coronavirus keep them from singing together! 👏👏👏 Bravo! #krgv #rgv #HeartoftheValley http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1244805544281604098/pu/img/o8St-NXzCBL4wMeM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1244805544281604098/pu/vid/480x270/xw9rRgo-KvAzYhZq.mp4?tag=10

People shouldn't have to put their lives on the line to vote. Wisconsin should join the 15 states delaying elections, delay Tuesday’s vote, extend early voting, and work to send every voter a ballot by mail. While we wait for a decision we urge our supporters to vote-by-mail.

RT @SteveDeaceShow This is the finest 5 minutes of cable news aired in this country in I don’t know how long. Actual journalism, instead of the witch’s brew known as whatever your channel’s narrative of the night happens to be. God bless @TuckerCarlson for going there. https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1245224915386728449 QT @tedcruz WATCH: @TuckerCarlson raises serious Qs. Why are NYT, WaPo, ABC, NBC, CBS, CNN not reporting on this? Are their corporate bosses more worried about big $$ & access to Chinese markets? A global pandemic originates just miles from TWO labs actively researching bat coronaviruses?!? https://twitter.com/columbiabugle/status/1245177279602233344

Social distancing is working. The tough sacrifices we make now will pay off in the long run. If we keep staying at home, the spread of the virus will slow. #FlattenTheCurve 
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/30/health/coronavirus-restrictions-fevers.html

🚨ATTN #TX BUSINESS OWNERS 🚨 https://twitter.com/IRSsmallbiz/status/1244595462948229121 QT @IRSsmallbiz Given the #COVID19 outbreak, #IRS is suspending compliance programs temporarily to ease the burden on people facing tax issues. See https://www.irs.gov/coronavirus http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUWw-ldWkAArbq4.jpg

Trump and his administration failed to take coronavirus seriously from the start.

They ignored intelligence warnings.
Didn’t start immediate testing.
Took weeks to utilize the Defense Production Act. 

Now 100,000 to 250,000 Americans are projected to die.

Hoy yo exhorto a que todos que vivan en los EE.UU completen el #Censo2020.

Es más importante que nunca que participemos en el censo para asegurar que los fondos para programas como atención médica y asistencia nutricional vayan a todos que los necesitan: https://2020census.gov/es/ways-to-respond.html

I am glad to continue my work with @SenatorTomUdall and colleagues to ensure that tribal nations – in MA and across the United States – receive the help they need and are entitled to in addressing COVID-19. https://twitter.com/SenatorTomUdall/status/1245447099665256449 QT @SenatorTomUdall We are urging the Trump administration to ensure that Tribal #COVID19 relief from the #CARESAct is distributed in a way that reflects the federal trust responsibility, respects tribal sovereignty, and provides for meaningful government-to-government consultation. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUi3fdUXsAIeRci.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUi3fdSX0AALJhK.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUi3fdUXQAAJhjL.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUi3fdTXgAAZE9V.jpg

Good. 

Corporations have a responsibility to protect their employees during this crisis. If they’re failing, employees must be able to raise concerns without fear of retribution. https://twitter.com/brigidbergin/status/1245061712325349377 QT @brigidbergin Amazon distribution center in NYC will be investigated by city over allegations that a worker was fired for raising health and safety concerns

Wonderful news! @DavidLat what a terrifying experience. Very glad you’ll soon be headed home. Know that Heidi & I are praying for your swift & full recovery. We need your incisive legal wit, snark & insight! Blessings. https://twitter.com/davidlat/status/1244985799868907521 QT @DavidLat Achievement unlocked: no longer on oxygen! We tapered it down gradually after I was extubated last week, and last night while I was asleep they cut it off entirely. #coronavirus #COVID19 #CoronaBoy

Remember: your Census response should be based on where you’d normally be living today (4/1/20) – even if you’re currently not there due to COVID-19. Grateful for California’s leadership on this issue. States must follow to ensure the safety of incarcerated individuals and prevent the spread of this deadly disease. 

Take action to Stop the Spread: http://allianceforsafetyandjustice.org/stopthespread/ https://twitter.com/latimes/status/1245094668615839744 QT @latimes Breaking: California is granting early release to 3,500 inmates in an effort to reduce crowding as coronavirus infections begin spreading through the state prison system. https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-03-31/coronavirus-california-release-3500-inmates-prisons

The cruelty and absurdity of our for-profit health care system is more obvious in the midst of this crisis than it has ever been. The American people want Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/MorningConsult/status/1245308678129016832 QT @MorningConsult New from @ymurad__: Support for "Medicare for All" reached a nine-month high in March, with 55% backing among all voters.

Net support jumped 9 points from February to March, as the coronavirus outbreak surged. https://morningconsult.com/2020/04/01/medicare-for-all-coronavirus-pandemic/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUdWlS9WAAE5jWX.jpg

The real April Fool’s joke is on everyone expecting the millions of people who just lost their incomes to pay full rent, mortgages,& major bills *TODAY* w/ few actual policies in place to help them do so. 

“Wait and see” is not a plan. We need payment & housing relief policies.

If you haven't already, please take some time to complete the 2020 Census. It's critical that we can get an accurate count. This is important—these results determine how federal resources are allocated.

Go to http://my2020census.gov to get started. #CensusDay https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1245131561131008002 QT @CNN April 1 is known as Census Day. Around the country, local officials are encouraging residents to complete census questionnaires this week. https://trib.al/wggmHv3

Amazon's warehouse workers protested because people are getting sick on the job.

Their demands were not radical: a safer workplace, protective gear and paid sick leave.

Amazon’s response? Retaliate by firing a worker who helped organize the walk-out. That is absolutely immoral. https://twitter.com/allinwithchris/status/1245350203013517313 QT @allinwithchris Chris Smalls was fired after a walkout at an Amazon warehouse. Amazon says he violated quarantine; he says the company isn’t protecting workers. 
https://www.msnbc.com/all-in/watch/-the-policy-is-very-flawed-amazon-worker-leads-protest-against-working-conditions-is-fired-81465925653 #inners

Are you a New Yorker that’s never applied for unemployment before, or needs help accessing the upcoming $1200 cash payment?

I got you!

TONIGHT @ 7pm I am personally walking you through the process of applying for UI and answering your questions.

RSVP: https://m.facebook.com/events/942741496147618/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUi4JhmX0AAyw0J.jpg

One thing I hope quarantine can teach is that childcare/caregiving is LABOR.

People are ordinarily paid (not enough) to do it, but those who aren’t being paid are still doing a full job.

& right now parents+caregivers WFH are doing 2+ jobs simultaneously.https://www.bbc.com/reel/video/p0885wz7/the-reality-of-confinement-with-a-four-year-old
RT @texasgov These are challenging times, but Texans are tough. You can count on http://Texas.gov for the latest information and resources. We’re here to help, so you can stay home—and stay safe.

We cannot continue to have a dysfunctional, greedy health care system which ties most people's health care coverage to employment, leaves tens of millions uninsured and bankrupts over 500,000 people a year.

We must guarantee health care as a human right through Medicare for All.

Blessed are you, O Lord, the God of our ancestors,praiseworthy and exalted above all forever; And blessed is your holy and glorious name,praiseworthy and exalted above all for all ages.

Daniel 3:52

We have to fight this. https://twitter.com/vanitaguptaCR/status/1244715303549964289 QT @vanitaguptaCR BREAKING: Trump will nominate Cory Wilson to the 5th Circuit (he was nominated to a district court last year but never confirmed).

Wilson has repeatedly attacked the Affordable Care Act & defended discriminatory photo ID laws. Truly awful civil rights record. We will fight this. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUYdKx3WsAEw-I6.jpg

A Medicare for All system is designed to provide quality care to all — not simply make huge amounts of money for insurance and drug companies. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1245421973263482880/img/JcWdiYzMeX5txG79.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245421973263482880/vid/320x320/lIi1_uCp3b3T61lb.mp4?tag=13
I support workers who strike, conduct a sick-out, or participate in a walk-off to support our collective health and safety amid this pandemic. Period.

The Constitution guarantees an individual right to keep and bear arms. The protections afforded by the 2nd Amendment are indispensable and they have served our nation well through tranquil times as well as turbulent ones. Our circumstances are no different https://www.wbko.com/content/news/Rand-Paul-advocates-for-deeming-firearms-industry-personnel-essential-personnel--569252311.html

Rent is due today and Americans need the $1,200 payment in their pockets right now. I'm calling on the IRS to disburse these payments immediately.

And let’s also be clear about this: these $1,200 payments aren’t nearly enough. Congress must do more.

The Federal Reserve estimates that upwards of 47 million people could lose their jobs.
 
That means tens of millions losing insurance in addition to the 30 million already uninsured.
 
Under Medicare for All, no one would lose their health insurance if they lost their job.

#Taiwan's open spirit shines through and, once, again, the island punches above its weight. Taiwan deserves praise for its efforts to protect its citizens and assist other nations during the #COVIDー19 pandemic. https://twitter.com/iingwen/status/1245316355609350146 QT @iingwen Today I announced three major areas where #Taiwan will contribute to the global fight against #COVID19:

 1️⃣: Donating 10 million face masks to countries in need.
 2️⃣: Increasing production of quinine.
 3️⃣: Sharing our use of technology to trace & investigate outbreaks. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUhAml_U4AAmMHI.jpg

RT @BostonGlobe Elizabeth Warren calls on Uber Eats, Instacart, others to classify workers as employees http://w.bos.gl/gMvTGWi

Because delivery companies classify workers as contractors & not employees, they don’t have guaranteed access to standard benefits like a minimum wage, health insurance, paid leave, unemployment & OSHA protections. This misclassification is wrong & it endangers everyone's health.

Even as we are focused on the crisis we face due to the #COVIDー19 pandemic, foreign policy & national security doesn’t stop. 

Interesting information relevant to the #MaduroMafia in  #Venezuela may be discussed today at the front end of @potus  5pm briefing at @WhiteHouse

WATCH: @TuckerCarlson raises serious Qs. Why are NYT, WaPo, ABC, NBC, CBS, CNN not reporting on this? Are their corporate bosses more worried about big $$ & access to Chinese markets? A global pandemic originates just miles from TWO labs actively researching bat coronaviruses?!? https://twitter.com/columbiabugle/status/1245177279602233344 QT @ColumbiaBugle Tucker on Chinese Scientists Saying the Coronavirus Likely Came From Horseshoe Bat

"Here is the striking thing, there are no known colonies of this bat within 900 kilometers of Wuhan."

The scientists found 2 possible locations for the Horseshoe Bat, 2 government labs in Wuhan. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUfAVEVU4AIbWTP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245174268251389954/vid/480x270/2Z09ayMLdy9mzaWY.mp4?tag=13

This Friday 3 April #SmallBusiness can start applying for & receiving payroll money under #PaycheckProtectionProgram 

Following Friday 10 April independent contractors & self-employed can apply for & receive payroll money

Start filling out this form now:
https://home.treasury.gov/system/files/136/Paycheck-Protection-Program-Application-3-30-2020-v3.pdf http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1245348389895708672/pu/img/G3cM1jrVNnKajfw_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1245348389895708672/pu/vid/320x362/m5op1knaqxoxGW9S.mp4?tag=10

While there is no simple health care fix to the destruction of coronavirus, under a Medicare for All system, everyone would have comprehensive health care free at the point of service. No one would avoid going to the doctor due to cost, or go into debt just for getting sick.

It's important to have plans to get in front of a crisis rather than chasing it from behind. If we had put in place a plan to deal with the coronavirus in January we would've saved lives, and we would be better prepared for the public health and economic crisis that we’re in now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUjWkhEXQAAAp1_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245480029666115585/vid/480x270/Tz-JBT_z-V7RPCwQ.mp4?tag=13

Go to http://HealthCare.gov for more information.

ICYMI with @HughHewitt: The CARES Act helps people who are badly hurting as a result of government policies to #CombatCOVID19. It will:
💵 Send checks directly to individuals/families ($1,200/adult & $500/child)
💵 Provide $377B for emergency loans to small businesses http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1245509557796974593/img/jBDaK-sTmcfY8uJv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245509557796974593/vid/480x270/1uiJt3AutQ_HII7E.mp4?tag=13

Trump held campaign rallies on Jan 9, Jan 14, Jan 28, Jan 30, Feb 10, Feb 19, Feb 20, Feb 21 & Feb 28

The first time he admitted the coronavirus might be a problem was Mar 13

RT @ana_r_quintana Trump press briefing echoes @SenTedCruz from yesterday on importance of changing course on Venezuela to address new conditions created by #COVID19 across Latin America https://twitter.com/sentedcruz/status/1245077876761939968 QT @SenTedCruz As #COVID19 threatens to overwhelm Venezuela’s health system, which has already been devastated by Maduro & his cronies, I commend @realDonaldTrump and his admin for accelerating a proposal to form a transitional government in Venezuela and return power to the Venezuelan people. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUdnj5QXYAMvpOz.jpg
